## There are 3 components to a Quarto documents

1. the YML header:
  * parameters that define what the document will look like
  * color, background, typeface. table of contents, etc
  * YML = yet another markup language
  
2. Prose aka text
  * can make text **bold**
  * can make text *italic*
  * and on and on
